section1.title: 01 ⎯ Our Services
section1.scale-text: Access top-tier talent with our Staff Augmentation services. Boost productivity and efficiency with our skilled professionals.
section1.text1: From a diverse talent pool, our staff includes highly skilled remote developers proficient in backend, front-end, fullstack, and UX/UI design.
section1.text2: Our distributed team is time zone aligned across the United States and Europe, ensuring fluid collaboration regardless of location.
section1.text3: Get assistance in identifying project scope and goals, guidance in the incremental release of code, and quality-controlled deployment, driving outstanding results.
section1.agile-text: By embracing agile principles and methodologies, our dedicated team prioritizes frequent communication and rapid iterations to deliver value. We focus on a customer-centric approach and work software incrementally, making change part of the process. This enables us to efficiently tackle complex challenges, drive innovation and high-quality solutions that exceed expectations.

globalCustomersSection.title: Global customers
globalCustomersSection.mainText: We work with companies located in different parts of the world, providing dedicated expertise precisely tailored to your project needs and business objectives, ensuring successful outcomes.

item1.title: Scaling Teams
item1.text: We work with a broad network of programmers, who master various technologies and frameworks. This enables us to provide professionals to your team without delays, powering projects forwards.

item2.title: Efficient Hiring
item2.text: We engage in direct dealings as contractors, with a single point of contact. This allows you to streamline the recruitment process and creates a channel for future job searches.

item3.title: Support
item3.text: We stand behind the hired candidate, backed by 10 years of experience. Our proven understanding of diverse business environments enhances our problem-solving capabilities ensuring exceptional services.

item4.title: Quality
item4.text: Our teams benefit from in-house support and maintain a constant requirement for updates, ensuring that we remain at the forefront of technology. Our commitment to nurturing our people is evident in their growth and competitive edge.

section3.title: 03 ⎯ About us
section3.mainTitle: We are a democratically governed cooperative tech company managed by its own workers.

header.title: We are a tech workers cooperative

roadMapSection.title: Our road map
roadMapSection.paragraph:
Our business is owned and run by its members, understanding each other's ideas as equally important.

We established ourselves as a software development company in 2007. A decade later, in 2018, we took the big step and transitioned into a cooperative organization. Currently, our main team is based in Bariloche, Argentine Patagonia, a place we love. We are also located in Rosario, Buenos Aires, Spain, and the United States.

left.text1: We collectively and autonomously decide on the projects and strategic direction we wish to pursue, as well as how to organize ourselves.
left.text2: We are a part of the communities we belong to, striving to contribute through technology to the advancement of a more equitable society.
left.title3: We are in the right place
left.text3: We do what we love, we develop professionally, and we engage in a supportive and collaborative environment.
left.text4: We have control over our finances, deciding how to distribute the income from our work and which projects we deem important to sustain.

joinOurTeamSection.title: Join our inspiring team
joinOurTeamSection.paragraph1: Collaborate with experts across challenging projects and diverse technologies, while feeling supported in an encouraging environment that fosters learning and growth.
joinOurTeamSection.subtitle: Our working philosophy
joinOurTeamSection.paragraph2: We recognize that everyone's journey is unique, and we are committed to motivating and considering individual interests and needs while also driving the group forward.

item1.title: We are a hybrid team
item1.text: With some members fully remote and others commuting to the office daily. Depending on your preferences and circumstances, you can opt for either, or a combination of both.

item2.title: Time off  and leaves
item2.text: Building a balance between work and other aspects of your life, we offer a minimum of 15 days of vacation, along with 12 national holidays, as well as parental and wedding leave for cooperative members.

item3.title: Development opportunities
item3.text: We provide competitive salaries and career development opportunities, including an annual seniority review process.

item4.title: Shape your future
item4.text:
Enhance your communication skills through our english classes led by both local and native speakers, and ongoing interaction with clients spanning the globe.

Additionally, we provide access to tailored training in essential programming languages courses, which we cover, so you can further hone your skills.

item5.title: Values
item5.text:
We prioritize a culture of trust within our team, where peer support from our network and colleagues is essential for collective development. Here, you are encouraged to freely express your ideas in an open workplace environment.

And, although it should go without saying, we feel it's important to reiterate: we are an equal opportunity employer and welcome applicants from all backgrounds.

widerNetworkSection.title: Wider Network
widerNetworkSection.subtitlePt1: We are part of a bigger collective,
widerNetworkSection.subtitlePt2: , with a workforce capacity exceeding 450 members.
widerNetworkSection.paragraph1: As members of FACTTIC, Argentina's network of technology cooperatives, we collaborate to expand the range of services offered. Working alongside other cooperatives, we collectively enhance our capabilities and profiles, contributing to a workforce capacity exceeding 450 members. Together, we share a commitment to fostering fair labor relations, nurturing a supportive environment, and managing projects aligned with our collective interests and sovereignty.

positiveImpactSection.title: Training and Positive impact
positiveImpactSection.paragraph: We tackle projects that create synergy between updating ourselves, studying new technologies, and achieving a positive impact on our community. Through a scheme of internal meetings, we devise innovative solutions, architecture, design, and best programming practices implementation.

formSection.title: Get your project moving!
formSection.paragraph: Drop us a line if you want to boost your team's velocity or capacity. Also, get in touch for general inquiries, quotes, or just to share ideas. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

errors.phoneInvalid: Please enter a valid phone number
errors.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
errors.fileTooBig: File size must be less than 5MB

wannaJoinSection.title: Would you like to join our team?
wannaJoinSection.paragraph: Submit your resume to collaborate on upcoming projects, or contact us if you have any questions. We'd love to hear from you.

openPositions.title: Open positions
openPositions.noPositions: We're not currently hiring, but please send us your resume anyway, we'll keep it in mind for future opportunities.
